package.name: 9wcVR4bIlRVxfPN0
package.summary: Improve your sites’s online reputation and utilize it to drive traffic and increase conversion rates!
package.description: e-Store Info helps e-commerce businesses manage their online reputation across the web to improve conversion rates by up to 100%. We utilize unique algorithm to process and evaluate business data based on predetermined performance metrics including: volume of orders, shipping and cancellation rates. e-Store offers its basic version of integration for Magento businesses FREE.
package.notes: This is to display the order report statistic summary on our website.
